data:
Scott Tolinski Uses

Podcasting & Video

  • My camera - Sony A7iii
  • My microphone - Electro Voice RE-20 Cardioid Microphone
  • My audio interface - Focusrite Scarlett 2i2
  • My preamp - dbx 286s Microphone Preamp & Channel Strip Processor
  • My other preamp - Cloud Microphones Cloudlifter CL-1 Mic Activator
  • My dock - CalDigit TS3 Plus Thunderbolt 3
  • My studio monitors - M-Audio BX8 D2 8-Inch Active 2-Way Studio Monitor Speakers
  • My mic arm - K&M 23850 Microphone Desk Arm - Black
  • My laptop stand - Twelve South Curve
